name: Nidow
description:
Nidow is a 2D mulitplayer

Your goal in this game is to kill your opponent. But that won't be as easy as in other games to find him.

In fact, shadows are everywhere and they'll prevent you to see behind the walls.

However shadows are also your friends, you can hide yourself to kill your friend by surprise !

Note: This game was developed in Java using OpenGL.
